channel.title: CVE Feed for Realtek -- Linux/Android Bluetooth Mesh SDK

item.title: CVE-2022-26529|2024-09-17T01:46:15.626Z -- realtek -- linux%2Fandroid%20bluetooth%20mesh%20sdk
item.description: Realtek Linux/Android Bluetooth Mesh SDK has a buffer overflow vulnerability due to insufficient validation for segmented packetsâ€™ link parameter. An unauthenticated attacker in the adjacent network can exploit this vulnerability to cause buffer overflow and disrupt service.
